00019 /**
00020  *      return if GD image functions are available
00021  *
00022  *      @return bool
00023  */
00024 function _gd_available()
00025 {
00026         return function_exists('gd_info');
00027 }
00028 
00029 
00030 /**
00031  *      return the width and height of an image file
00032  *
00033  *      @param string $f filename
00034  *
00035  *      @return array with width and height in pixels
00036  */
00037 function _gd_get_imagesize($f)
00038 {
00039         $ret = @getimagesize($f);
00040         if ($ret === false) {
00041                 return array(0, 0);
00042         } else {
00043                 return array($ret[0], $ret[1]);
00044         }
00045 }

00048 /**
00049  *      implements alter_render_early
00050  *
00051  *      see image_render_object()
00052  */
00053 function image_alter_render_early($args)
00054 {
00055         $elem = &$args['elem'];
00056         $obj = $args['obj'];
00057         if (!elem_has_class($elem, 'image')) {
00058                 return false;
00059         }
00060         
00061         // try to calculate original-{width,height} if not already set
00062         if (!empty($obj['image-file']) && (empty($obj['image-file-width']) || intval($obj['image-file-width']) == 0)) {
00063                 if (_gd_available()) {
00064                         $a = expl('.', $obj['name']);
00065                         $fn = CONTENT_DIR.'/'.$a[0].'/shared/'.$obj['image-file'];
00066                         // resolve symlinks
00067                         if (@is_link($fn)) {
00068                                 $target = @readlink($fn);
00069                                 if (substr($target, 0, 1) == '/') {
00070                                         $fn = $target;
00071                                 } else {
00072                                         $fn = dirname($fn).'/'.$target;
00073                                 }
00074                         }
00075                         $size = _gd_get_imagesize($fn);
00076                         $obj['image-file-width'] = $size[0];
00077                         // update regular with as well if not set
00078                         if (empty($obj['object-width']) || intval($obj['object-width']) == 0) {
00079                                 $obj['object-width'] = $size[0].'px';
00080                         }
00081                         $obj['image-file-height'] = $size[1];
00082                         if (empty($obj['object-height']) || intval($obj['object-height']) == 0) {
00083                                 $obj['object-height'] = $size[1].'px';
00084                         }
00085                 }
00086                 save_object($obj);
00087         }
00088         
00089         // setup url
00090         // note: the url points to the object name, not the 
00091         // filename in the shared directory (the file eventually gets served 
00092         // in image_serve_resource())
00093         // TODO (later): support URLs as well
00094         if (SHORT_URLS) {
00095                 $url = base_url().urlencode($obj['name']);
00096         } else {
00097                 $url = base_url().'?'.urlencode($obj['name']);
00098         }
00099         
00100         // render a div with background if we have original-{width,height}
00101         // otherwise a div with an img inside
00102         if (empty($obj['image-file-width']) || intval($obj['image-file-width']) == 0) {
00103                 // render a div with an img inside
00104                 $i = elem('img');
00105                 elem_attr($i, 'src', $url);
00106                 if (!empty($obj['image-title'])) {
00107                         elem_attr($i, 'alt', $obj['image-title']);
00108                 } else {
00109                         elem_attr($i, 'alt', '');
00110                 }
00111                 // make sure you only append to the element in alter_render_early 
00112                 // handlers, don't assume that nothing is in there yet
00113                 elem_append($elem, $i);
00114         } else {
00115                 if (!$args['edit'] && IE8_COMPAT && (empty($obj['image-background-repeat']) || $obj['image-background-repeat'] == 'no-repeat')) {
00116                         // background-size is not supported by IE8, so render a div with an img inside instead
00117                         $i = elem('img');
00118                         elem_attr($i, 'src', $url);
00119                         if (!empty($obj['image-title'])) {
00120                                 elem_attr($i, 'alt', $obj['image-title']);
00121                         } else {
00122                                 elem_attr($i, 'alt', '');
00123                         }
00124                         elem_css($i, 'width', '100%');
00125                         elem_css($i, 'height', '100%');
00126                         elem_css($i, 'padding', '0px');
00127                         elem_css($i, 'border', '0px');
00128                         if (!empty($obj['image-background-position']) && $obj['image-background-position'] != '0px 0px' && $obj['image-background-position'] != '0% 0%') {
00129                                 elem_css($elem, 'max-width', $obj['object-width']);
00130                                 elem_css($elem, 'max-height', $obj['object-height']);
00131                                 elem_css($elem, 'overflow', 'hidden');
00132                                 // assume px
00133                                 $a = expl(' ', $obj['image-background-position']);
00134                                 elem_css($i, 'margin-left', @intval($a[0]).'px');
00135                                 elem_css($i, 'margin-top', @intval($a[1]).'px');
00136                                 elem_css($i, 'margin-right', '0px');
00137                                 elem_css($i, 'margin-bottom', '0px');
00138                         } else {
00139                                 elem_css($i, 'margin', '0px');
00140                         }
00141                         elem_append($elem, $i);
00142                 } else {
00143                         // this is the regular case
00144                         // render a div with background
00145                         elem_css($elem, 'background-image', 'url('.$url.')');
00146                         // default to no tiling
00147                         if (empty($obj['image-background-repeat']) || $obj['image-background-repeat'] == 'no-repeat') {
00148                                 elem_css($elem, 'background-repeat', 'no-repeat');
00149                                 // set hardcoded background-size as well
00150                                 elem_css($elem, 'background-size', '100% 100%');
00151                                 // this is for Firefox 3.6
00152                                 elem_css($elem, '-moz-background-size', '100% 100%');
00153                         } else {
00154                                 elem_css($elem, 'background-repeat', $obj['image-background-repeat']);
00155                         }
00156                         if (!empty($obj['image-background-position'])) {
00157                                 elem_css($elem, 'background-position', $obj['image-background-position']);
00158                         }
00159                 }
00160         }
00161         
00162         // additional properties for both
00163         if (!empty($obj['image-title'])) {
00164                 elem_attr($elem, 'title', $obj['image-title']);
00165         }
00166         
00167         return true;
00168 }

00171 /**
00172  *      implements alter_save
00173  *
00174  *      see image_save_state()
00175  */
00176 function image_alter_save($args)
00177 {
00178         $elem = $args['elem'];
00179         // make sure that obj is a reference to the other object here
00180         $obj = &$args['obj'];
00181         // only handle the element when we are one of its classes
00182         // notice the difference to image_save_state()?
00183         if (!elem_has_class($elem, 'image')) {
00184                 return false;
00185         }
00186         
00187         // update the object based on the element's properties
00188         // by convention all properties are prefixed with the module name, in order 
00189         // to prevent any naming collisions
00190         if (elem_css($elem, 'background-repeat') !== NULL) {
00191                 $val = elem_css($elem, 'background-repeat');
00192                 // normalize
00193                 if ($val == 'no-repeat no-repeat') {
00194                         $val = 'no-repeat';
00195                 }
00196                 $obj['image-background-repeat'] = $val;
00197         } else {
00198                 unset($obj['image-background-repeat']);
00199         }
00200         if (elem_css($elem, 'background-position') !== NULL) {
00201                 $obj['image-background-position'] = elem_css($elem, 'background-position');
00202         } else {
00203                 unset($obj['image-background-position']);
00204         }
00205         
00206         // this is more out of courtesy than anything else
00207         return true;
00208 }

00211 /**
00212  *      implements delete_object
00213  */
00214 function image_delete_object($args)
00215 {
00216         $obj = $args['obj'];
00217         if (!isset($obj['type']) || $obj['type'] != 'image') {
00218                 return false;
00219         }
00220         // we don't have to care about symlinks here as this hook is not called 
00221         // for those
00222         
00223         load_modules('glue');
00224         // delete original file
00225         if (!empty($obj['image-file'])) {
00226                 $a = expl('.', $obj['name']);
00227                 delete_upload(array('pagename'=>$a[0], 'file'=>$obj['image-file'], 'max_cnt'=>1));
00228         }
00229         // and resized one
00230         if (!empty($obj['image-resized-file'])) {
00231                 $a = expl('.', $obj['name']);
00232                 delete_upload(array('pagename'=>$a[0], 'file'=>$obj['image-resized-file'], 'max_cnt'=>1));
00233         }
00234 }

00237 /**
00238  *      implements has_reference
00239  */
00240 function image_has_reference($args)
00241 {
00242         $obj = $args['obj'];
00243         if (!isset($obj['type']) || $obj['type'] != 'image') {
00244                 return false;
00245         }
00246         // symlinks have their referenced files in a different page that's why 
00247         // they are not relevant here
00248         if (@is_link(CONTENT_DIR.'/'.str_replace('.', '/', $obj['name']))) {
00249                 return false;
00250         }
00251         
00252         if (!empty($obj['image-file']) && $obj['image-file'] == $args['file']) {
00253                 return true;
00254         }
00255         if (!empty($obj['image-resized-file']) && $obj['image-resized-file'] == $args['file']) {
00256                 return true;
00257         }
00258         
00259         return false;
00260 }

00263 /**
00264  *      implements render_object
00265  */
00266 function image_render_object($args)
00267 {
00268         $obj = $args['obj'];
00269         if (!isset($obj['type']) || $obj['type'] != 'image') {
00270                 return false;
00271         }
00272         
00273         // the outer element must be a div or something else that can contain 
00274         // other elements
00275         // we only set up the most basic element here - all the other work is 
00276         // done inside the alter_render_early hook
00277         // this way also object that "derive" from this (which don't have their 
00278         // $obj['type'] set to image) can use this code
00279         $e = elem('div');
00280         elem_attr($e, 'id', $obj['name']);
00281         elem_add_class($e, 'image');
00282         elem_add_class($e, 'resizable');
00283         elem_add_class($e, 'object');
00284         
00285         // hook
00286         // elem is passed as reference here
00287         // it is suggested that we first call our own function before any others 
00288         // that might want to modify the element that is being set up
00289         invoke_hook_first('alter_render_early', 'image', array('obj'=>$obj, 'elem'=>&$e, 'edit'=>$args['edit']));
00290         $html = elem_finalize($e);
00291         // html is passed as reference here
00292         // it is suggested that we call our own function after all others
00293         invoke_hook_last('alter_render_late', 'image', array('obj'=>$obj, 'html'=>&$html, 'elem'=>$e, 'edit'=>$args['edit']));
00294         
00295         return $html;
00296 }
00297 
00298 register_hook('alter_render_early', 'invoked early in the object rendering process (possible to change array representation)');
00299 register_hook('alter_render_late', 'invoked late in the object rendering process (possible to change html string)');
00300

00302 /**
00303  *      implements render_page_early
00304  */
00305 function image_render_page_early($args)
00306 {
00307         if ($args['edit']) {
00308                 if (USE_MIN_FILES) {
00309                         html_add_js(base_url().'modules/image/image-edit.min.js');
00310                 } else {
00311                         html_add_js(base_url().'modules/image/image-edit.js');
00312                 }
00313                 if (!_gd_available()) {
00314                         html_add_js_var('$.glue.conf.image.resizing', false);
00315                         log_msg('debug', 'image: disabling image resizing as gd is not available');
00316                 } else {
00317                         html_add_js_var('$.glue.conf.image.resizing', IMAGE_RESIZING);          
00318                 }
00319                 html_add_js_var('$.glue.conf.image.upload_resize_larger', IMAGE_UPLOAD_RESIZE_LARGER);
00320                 html_add_js_var('$.glue.conf.image.upload_resize_to', IMAGE_UPLOAD_RESIZE_TO);
00321         }
00322 }

00325 /**
00326  *      resize an image object
00327  *
00328  *      this function drops the reference to any currently resized version, 
00329  *      saves the resized image together with the original image in the page's 
00330  *      shared folder and updates the object file to use the resized version.
00331  *      @param array $args arguments
00332  *              key 'name' name of the objects
00333  *              key 'width' width in px
00334  *              key 'height' height in px
00335  *      @return array response
00336  *              true if the client is advised to reload the image, false if not
00337  */
00338 function image_resize($args)
00339 {
00340         // check for gd
00341         if (!_gd_available()) {
00342                 return response('Host does not have gd', 500);
00343         }
00344         // set requested width & height
00345         if (($width = @intval($args['width'])) == 0) {
00346                 return response('Required argument "width" is zero or does not exist', 400);
00347         }
00348         if (($height = @intval($args['height'])) == 0) {
00349                 return response('Required argument "height" is zero or does not exist', 400);
00350         }
00351         load_modules('glue');
00352         // resolve symlinks
00353         $ret = object_get_symlink($args);
00354         if ($ret['#error']) {
00355                 return $ret;
00356         } elseif ($ret['#data'] !== false) {
00357                 log_msg('debug', 'image_resize: resolved object '.quot($args['name']).' into '.quot($ret['#data']));
00358                 $args['name'] = $ret['#data'];
00359         }       
00360         // load object
00361         $obj = load_object($args);
00362         if ($obj['#error']) {
00363                 return $obj;
00364         } else {
00365                 $obj = $obj['#data'];
00366         }
00367         if (@intval($obj['image-file-width']) == 0 || @intval($obj['image-file-height']) == 0) {
00368                 return response('Original dimensions are not available', 500);
00369         }
00370         // set pagename
00371         $pn = array_shift(expl('.', $obj['name']));
00372         
00373         // resizing might not be necessary at all
00374         if (!empty($obj['image-resized-file']) && @intval($obj['image-resized-width']) == $width && @intval($obj['image-resized-height'] == $height)) {
00375                 log_msg('debug', 'image_resize: width and height match the current resized file, no resize necessary');
00376                 return response(false);
00377         }
00378         
00379         // else remove any currently resized file
00380         if (!empty($obj['image-resized-file'])) {
00381                 log_msg('info', 'image_resize: dropping reference to previous resized file '.quot($obj['image-resized-file']));
00382                 delete_upload(array('pagename'=>$pn, 'file'=>$obj['image-resized-file'], 'max_cnt'=>1));
00383                 unset($obj['image-resized-file']);
00384                 unset($obj['image-resized-width']);
00385                 unset($obj['image-resized-height']);
00386                 // update object file as well
00387                 $ret = object_remove_attr(array('name'=>$obj['name'], 'attr'=>array('image-resized-file', 'image-resized-width', 'image-resized-height')));
00388                 if ($ret['#error']) {
00389                         return $ret;
00390                 }
00391                 $was_resized = true;
00392         } else {
00393                 $was_resized = false;
00394         }
00395         
00396         // check if width or height are larger than the original
00397         if (@intval($obj['image-file-width']) <= $width || @intval($obj['image-file-height']) <= $height) {
00398                 log_msg('debug', 'image_resize: dimensions requested are larger or equal than the original file is, no resize necessary');
00399                 // the client need not reload the the image if we were using the 
00400                 // original before
00401                 if (!$was_resized) {
00402                         return response(false);
00403                 } else {
00404                         return response(true);
00405                 }
00406         }
00407         
00408         // check if we really have a source image
00409         if (empty($obj['image-file-mime']) && empty($obj['image-file'])) {
00410                 return response(false);
00411         }
00412         
00413         // TODO (later): make this a generic function
00414         // load source file
00415         $ext = filext($obj['image-file']);
00416         $fn = CONTENT_DIR.'/'.$pn.'/shared/'.$obj['image-file'];
00417         if ($obj['image-file-mime'] == 'image/jpeg' || in_array($ext, array('jpg', 'jpeg'))) {
00418                 $orig = @imagecreatefromjpeg($fn);
00419                 $dest_ext = 'jpg';
00420         } elseif ($obj['image-file-mime'] == 'image/png' || $ext == 'png') {
00421                 $orig = @imagecreatefrompng($fn);
00422                 $dest_ext = 'png';
00423         } elseif ($obj['image-file-mime'] == 'image/gif' || $ext == 'gif') {
00424                 $orig = @imagecreatefromgif($fn);
00425                 // save gifs as png
00426                 // TODO (later): check for animated gif (see php.net/manual/en/function.imagecreatefromgif.php)
00427                 $dest_ext = 'png';
00428         } else {
00429                 return response('Unsupported source file format '.quot($obj['image-file']), 500);
00430         }
00431         if ($orig === false) {
00432                 return response('Error loading source file '.quot($obj['image-file']), 500);
00433         }
00434         // get source file dimensions
00435         $orig_size = @getimagesize($fn);
00436         // create resized image
00437         if (($resized = @imagecreatetruecolor($width, $height)) === false) {
00438                 @imagedestroy($orig);
00439                 return response('Error creating the resized image', 500);
00440         }
00441         // preserve any alpha channel
00442         @imagealphablending($resized, false);
00443         @imagesavealpha($resized, true);
00444         // try to resize
00445         if (!@imagecopyresampled($resized, $orig, 0, 0, 0, 0, $width, $height, $orig_size[0], $orig_size[1])) {
00446                 @imagedestroy($resized);
00447                 @imagedestroy($orig);
00448                 return response('Error resizing the source image', 500);
00449         }
00450         // setup destination filename
00451         $a = expl('.', $obj['image-file']);
00452         if (1 < count($a)) {
00453                 // throw the previous extension away
00454                 $fn = CONTENT_DIR.'/'.$pn.'/shared/'.implode('.', array_slice($a, 0, -1)).'-'.$width.'x'.$height.'.'.$dest_ext;
00455         } else {
00456                 $fn = CONTENT_DIR.'/'.$pn.'/shared/'.$a[0].'-'.$width.'x'.$height.'.'.$dest_ext;
00457         }
00458         $m = umask(0111);
00459         if ($dest_ext == 'jpg') {
00460                 $ret = @imagejpeg($resized, $fn, IMAGE_JPEG_QUAL);
00461         } else if ($dest_ext == 'png') {
00462                 // preserve any alpha channel
00463                 @imagealphablending($resized, false);
00464                 @imagesavealpha($resized, true);
00465                 $ret = @imagepng($resized, $fn, IMAGE_PNG_QUAL);
00466         }
00467         umask($m);
00468         // destroy images again
00469         @imagedestroy($resized);
00470         @imagedestroy($orig);
00471         if (!$ret) {
00472                 return response('Error saving the resized image', 500);
00473         } else {
00474                 log_msg('info', 'image_resize: created a resized image of '.quot($obj['name']).' -> '.quot(basename($fn)));
00475         }
00476         
00477         // the code above can take a while, so read in the object anew via 
00478         // update_object()
00479         $update = array();
00480         $update['name'] = $obj['name'];
00481         $update['image-resized-file'] = basename($fn);
00482         $update['image-resized-width'] = $width;
00483         $update['image-resized-height'] = $height;
00484         // we change width and height here as well since we are racing with the 
00485         // save_object from the frontend after resize
00486         $update['object-width'] = $width.'px';
00487         $update['object-height'] = $height.'px';
00488         
00489         return update_object($update);
00490 }
00491 
00492 register_service('image.resize', 'image_resize', array('auth'=>true));

00494 
00495 /**
00496  *      implements save_state
00497  */
00498 function image_save_state($args)
00499 {
00500         $elem = $args['elem'];
00501         $obj = $args['obj'];
00502         // only take responsibility for the element when we are its main class
00503         if (array_shift(elem_classes($elem)) != 'image') {
00504                 return false;
00505         }
00506         
00507         // make sure the type is set
00508         $obj['type'] = 'image';
00509         $obj['module'] = 'image';
00510         
00511         // by convention the main retrieving of the elements properties takes 
00512         // place in alter_state
00513         // this way other objects types may "derive" from this one
00514         // it also allows other modules to chime in
00515         // notice: obj is passed as reference here
00516         // obj might be (almost) empty for newly created objects, so rely only 
00517         // on $elem
00518         invoke_hook('alter_save', array('obj'=>&$obj, 'elem'=>$elem));
00519         // see image_alter_save() above
00520         
00521         // we could do some overriding here if we wanted to
00522         
00523         // finally save the object
00524         load_modules('glue');
00525         $ret = save_object($obj);
00526         if ($ret['#error']) {
00527                 log_msg('error', 'image_save_state: save_object returned '.quot($ret['#data']));
00528                 return false;
00529         } else {
00530                 return true;
00531         }
00532 }
00533 
00534 register_hook('alter_save', 'invoked in the object saving process (possible to augment the object to be saved)');
00535 
00536 
00537 /**
00538  *      implements serve_resource
00539  */
00540 function image_serve_resource($args)
00541 {
00542         $obj = $args['obj'];
00543         if (!isset($obj['type']) || $obj['type'] != 'image') {
00544                 return false;
00545         }
00546         // we don't have to care about symlinks here as they are being resolved 
00547         // before this hook is called
00548         $pn = array_shift(expl('.', $obj['name']));
00549         
00550         if (!empty($obj['image-resized-file']) && !$args['dl']) {
00551                 // we have a resized file and don't want to download the original
00552                 $fn = CONTENT_DIR.'/'.$pn.'/shared/'.$obj['image-resized-file'];
00553                 $ext = filext($fn);
00554                 if ($ext == 'jpg' || $ext == 'jpeg') {
00555                         serve_file($fn, false, 'image/jpeg');
00556                 } else if ($ext == 'png') {
00557                         serve_file($fn, false, 'image/png');
00558                 } else {
00559                         log_msg('warn', 'image_serve_resource: unsupported image-resized-file '.quot($fn));
00560                 }
00561                 // if we're still alive it means that the resized file has not been 
00562                 // found
00563                 log_msg('warn', 'image_serve_resource: could not serve image-resized-file '.quot($fn).', falling back to original');
00564                 $need_auth = false;
00565         } elseif (empty($obj['image-resized-file'])) {
00566                 // we don't have a resized file
00567                 $need_auth = false;
00568         } else {
00569                 // we really want to download the original
00570                 $need_auth = true;
00571         }
00572         
00573         if (!empty($obj['image-file'])) {
00574                 // we have the original file
00575                 if ($need_auth && !is_auth()) {
00576                         // require authentication
00577                         prompt_auth(true);
00578                 }
00579                 if (empty($obj['image-file-mime'])) {
00580                         $obj['image-file-mime'] = '';
00581                 }
00582                 serve_file(CONTENT_DIR.'/'.$pn.'/shared/'.$obj['image-file'], $args['dl'], $obj['image-file-mime']);
00583         }
00584         
00585         // if everything fails
00586         return false;
00587 }
00588 
00589 
00590 /**
00591  *      implements snapshot_symlink
00592  *
00593  *      see snapshot() in module_glue.inc.php
00594  */
00595 function image_snapshot_symlink($args)
00596 {
00597         $obj = $args['obj'];
00598         if (!isset($obj['type']) || $obj['type'] != 'image') {
00599                 return false;
00600         }
00601         
00602         // consider the following:
00603         // * an image object is on page a, which at some point got distributed to all 
00604         // other pages through symlinks
00605         // * we are now creating a snapshot of any page b, come across the symlink 
00606         // pointing to an object and page a
00607         // in this case we don't copy the symlink but the current content of the 
00608         // object, as we by all means want to preserve the current _state_ we copy 
00609         // the symlink's content (this happens in snapshot() in module_glue.inc.php) 
00610         // - thus turning it into a first-class object on the new snapshot-page
00611         // because of this we need to copy any referenced files as well from the 
00612         // shared directory in page a to the one on page b, this happens in this 
00613         // hook
00614         
00615         $dest_dir = CONTENT_DIR.'/'.array_shift(expl('.', $obj['name'])).'/shared';
00616         $src_dir = CONTENT_DIR.'/'.array_shift(expl('.', $args['origin'])).'/shared';
00617         
00618         // we do this for image-file and image-resized-file
00619         // .. to add a bit of complexity ;)
00620         foreach (array('image-file', 'image-resized-file') as $field) {
00621                 if (empty($obj[$field])) {
00622                         continue;
00623                 } else {
00624                         $src_file = $src_dir.'/'.$obj[$field];
00625                 }
00626                 if (($f = dir_has_same_file($dest_dir, $src_file)) !== false) {
00627                         $obj[$field] = $f;
00628                 } else {
00629                         // copy file
00630                         $dest_file = $dest_dir.'/'.unique_filename($dest_dir, $src_file);
00631                         $m = umask(0111);
00632                         if (!(@copy($src_file, $dest_file))) {
00633                                 umask($m);
00634                                 log_msg('error', 'image_snapshot_symlink: error copying referenced file '.quot($src_file).' to '.quot($dest_file));
00635                                 return false;
00636                         }
00637                         umask($m);
00638                         $obj[$field] = basename($dest_file);
00639                         log_msg('info', 'image_snapshot_symlink: copied referenced file to '.quot($dest_file));
00640                 }
00641         }
00642         
00643         // save changes in the object
00644         $ret = save_object($obj);
00645         if ($ret['#error']) {
00646                 log_msg('error', 'image_snapshot_symlink: error saving object '.quot($obj['name']));
00647                 return false;
00648         } else {
00649                 return true;
00650         }
00651 }
00652 
00653 
00654 /**
00655  *      implements upload
00656  */
00657 function image_upload($args)
00658 {
00659         // check if supported file
00660         if (!in_array($args['mime'], array('image/jpeg', 'image/png', 'image/gif')) || ($args['mime'] == '' && !in_array(filext($args['file']), array('jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif')))) {
00661                 return false;
00662         }
00663         
00664         load_modules('glue');
00665         // create new object
00666         $obj = create_object($args);
00667         if ($obj['#error']) {
00668                 return false;
00669         } else {
00670                 $obj = $obj['#data'];
00671         }
00672         $obj['type'] = 'image';
00673         // this is for a potential future speedup
00674         $obj['module'] = 'image';
00675         $obj['image-file'] = $args['file'];
00676         $obj['image-file-mime'] = $args['mime'];
00677         // save original-{width,height} if we can calculate it
00678         if (_gd_available()) {
00679                 $a = expl('.', $args['page']);
00680                 $size = _gd_get_imagesize(CONTENT_DIR.'/'.$a[0].'/shared/'.$obj['image-file']);
00681                 $obj['image-file-width'] = $size[0];
00682                 $obj['object-width'] = $size[0].'px';
00683                 $obj['image-file-height'] = $size[1];
00684                 $obj['object-height'] = $size[1].'px';
00685         }
00686         save_object($obj);
00687         
00688         // render object and return html
00689         $ret = render_object(array('name'=>$obj['name'], 'edit'=>true));
00690         if ($ret['#error']) {
00691                 return false;
00692         } else {
00693                 return $ret['#data'];
00694         }
00695 }
